title: Hurricane Melissa turned sharply to devastate Jamaica − how forecasters knew where it was headed

title: 4 urgent lessons for Jamaica’s hurricane recovery from Puerto Rico’s struggles – and how the Jamaican diaspora could help after Melissa
description: Disaster recovery is much harder on isolated islands, and people may migrate  away if it’s too slow. Support from Jamaicans in the US, UK and Canada to rebuild better can help.

Across Jamaic… [+10604 chars]

Auf abgelegenen Inseln ist die Wiederherstellung nach einem Katastrophenfall viel schwieriger, und Menschen könnten wegwandern, wenn sie zu langsam ist. Die Unterstützung von Jamaikanern in den USA, Großbritannien und Kanada für einen besseren Wiederaufbau kann hilfreich sein.

title: Warming Made Hurricane Melissa Four Times More Likely
description: Hurricane Melissa tore through Jamaica, Haiti, and Cuba this week as one of the most powerful Atlantic storms on record. A new analysis finds that warming made the cyclone four times as likely to hit today as in preindustrial times.Read more on E360 →
content: Hurricane Melissa tore through Jamaica, Haiti, and Cuba this week as one of the most powerful Atlantic storms on record. A new analysis finds that warming made the cyclone four times as likely to hit… [+969 chars]
de: Die Erwärmung machte den Hurrikan Melissa viermal wahrscheinlicher. Hurrikan Melissa wütete diese Woche als einer der stärksten Atlantikstürme aller Zeiten über Jamaika, Haiti und Kuba. Eine neue Analyse kommt zu dem Ergebnis, dass die Wahrscheinlichkeit eines Zyklons aufgrund der Erwärmung heute viermal höher ist als in vorindustriellen Zeiten. Lesen Sie mehr über E360 →
en: Warming Made Hurricane Melissa Four Times More Likely. Hurricane Melissa tore through Jamaica, Haiti, and Cuba this week as one of the most powerful Atlantic storms on record. A new analysis finds that warming made the cyclone four times as likely to hit today as in preindustrial times.Read more on E360 →
la: Calefaciens Melissa Procellae quater Magis Verisimile fecit. Procellae Melissa per Iamaicam, Haiti et Cubam hac septimana unam ex tempestatibus Atlanticis potentissimis ediderunt. Nova analysis invenit calefactionem cyclonum quadrupliciter factam quam verisimile est hodie ferire sicut in temporibus preindustrialibus. Read more in E360 →

title: Bogus Hurricane Vids Confuse, Horrify Online Viewers

en: Bogus Hurricane Vids Confuse, Horrify Online Viewers. Fake videos circulating social media show catastrophic damages and sharks swimming in a Jamaican hotel pool, the Associated Press (AP) reported.
la: Bogus Procellae Vids Confuse, horrendum Online Visores. Fake videos circulantes socialis instrumentorum damna catastrophica ostendunt et squalis natantes in lacu Jamaicano deversorio, diurnariis Associatis (AP) retulerunt.

title: Hurricane Melissa Cripples Jamaica’s Tourism and Highlights Climate Risk
description: As climate change fuels ever-stronger hurricanes, Jamaica’s battered tourism industry faces an urgent reckoning and so do the companies invested in its future.
content:
Hurricane Melissa tore across Jamaica this week, shredding roofs, flooding resorts, and shuttering airports in a country where tourism is the economic backbone.
Now, as officials begin to tally the … [+638 chars]
de: Hurrikan Melissa lähmt Jamaikas Tourismus und macht das Klimarisiko deutlich. Da der Klimawandel immer stärkere Hurrikane auslöst, steht die angeschlagene Tourismusbranche Jamaikas vor einer dringenden Abrechnung, ebenso wie die Unternehmen, die in ihre Zukunft investiert haben.
en: Hurricane Melissa Cripples Jamaica’s Tourism and Highlights Climate Risk. As climate change fuels ever-stronger hurricanes, Jamaica’s battered tourism industry faces an urgent reckoning and so do the companies invested in its future.
la: Turbo Melissa Cripples Tourism et Highlights Climate Risk. Sicut cibus mutatio climatis vehementiores procellae, iamaicae industriae similesve industriae rationem urgentem reddit et societates in futuro suo collocatas faciunt.

title: The psychological toll of hurricanes – major storms leave more than wreckage behind
description: Across the Caribbean, rebuilding after disaster means more than clearing debris. The real recovery is psychological, and it can take years.
content: When a hurricane strikes, the first images we see are of roofs ripped off, trees uprooted and streets turned into rivers. But the psychological toll is just as real, and it often lasts far longer tha… [+6275 chars]
de: Der psychologische Tribut von Hurrikanen – große Stürme hinterlassen mehr als nur Trümmer. In der gesamten Karibik bedeutet der Wiederaufbau nach einer Katastrophe mehr als nur die Beseitigung von Trümmern. Die eigentliche Genesung ist psychologischer Natur und kann Jahre dauern.
en: The psychological toll of hurricanes – major storms leave more than wreckage behind. Across the Caribbean, rebuilding after disaster means more than clearing debris. The real recovery is psychological, and it can take years.
la: Psychicum theloneum turbinum - maioribus procellis plus quam naufragium relinquit. Trans Caribbean, post calamitatem reaedificandi, plus significat quam strages purgandi. Recuperatio realis est psychologica, quae annis capere potest.

title: Bugging in: A smart survival strategy for sheltering in place during a crisis
description: Bugging in is often safer than evacuating, allowing reliance on stockpiled supplies and fortified defenses in familiar surroundings. Key advantages include avoiding external threats, accessing prepared resources and maintaining stability for vulnerable family…
content:
• Bugging in is often safer than evacuating, allowing reliance on stockpiled supplies and fortified defenses in familiar surroundings.
  • Key advantages include avoiding external threats, … [+5591 chars]
de: Abhören: Eine clevere Überlebensstrategie, um während einer Krise Schutz zu bieten. Ein Einbruch ist oft sicherer als eine Evakuierung, da man sich auf gehortete Vorräte und befestigte Verteidigungsanlagen in vertrauter Umgebung verlassen kann. Zu den wichtigsten Vorteilen gehören die Vermeidung externer Bedrohungen, der Zugriff auf vorbereitete Ressourcen und die Aufrechterhaltung der Stabilität für gefährdete Familien.
en: Bugging in: A smart survival strategy for sheltering in place during a crisis. Bugging in is often safer than evacuating, allowing reliance on stockpiled supplies and fortified defenses in familiar surroundings. Key advantages include avoiding external threats, accessing prepared resources and maintaining stability for vulnerable family…
la: Bugging in: Callida superstes belli tutandi in loco in crisi. Bugging in saepe tutior est quam emissus, densato commeatu et munitis praesidiis in locis familiaribus fretus praebens.
